body:
Comment 15: 
Now, that we have path/filepath, if we rewrite above mentioned program as:

package main

import (
	"path/filepath"
	"fmt"
)

func main() {
	fmt.Println(filepath.Join("directory", "file"))
}

it prints

directory\file

Should we close this issue?
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
